title: Glam And Glossy
description: Glam And Glossy is a beauty makeup game where you step into the role of a personal stylist for the fabulous trio of fashionistas â€“ Ashley, Rose, and Olivia. Dive into a world inspired by Euphoria, embracing vibrant colors and metallic glam. Unleash your creativity as you craft stunning makeup looks, blending glitter, glamour, and glossiness to capture the essence of each BFF's unique aesthetic. It's a dazzling journey through the art of makeup, where you become the master of style for these trendsetting friends.
